title: Acupuncture Injection Therapy — Saint Lucie Acupuncture & Integrative Medicine
author: St Lucie Acupuncture
description: This Integrative Therapy technique combines both Chinese medicine and homeopathic remedies for an injection in an acupuncture point specific to the patients needs. Injections offered at the clinic will include Traumeel, Zeel, Cosmetic rejuvenation, Arnica, Engystol, Vitamin B12, and Vitamin C.
cleaned_text: Therapy technique combines both Chinese medicine and homeopathic remedies for an injection in an acupuncture point specific to the patients needs. Injections offered at the clinic will include Traumeel, Zeel, Cosmetic rejuvenation, Arnica, Engystol, Vitamin B12, and Vitamin C. Traumeel is an anti-inflammatory made with a combination of 12 botanical substances and 1 mineral. It helps pain relief and can be an all natural alternative to the cortisone shot. Traumeel can aid in chronic joint pain, chronic lower back pain, ligament, tendon and muscle tears, and sports injuries. Engystol is a homeopathic remedy that naturally strengthens the immune system. It has been proven to significantly reduce the symptoms of viral infections and duration of sickness. It can allow much shorter recovery periods, milder symptoms and help protect against viruses going around. This injection can also work as an all natural alternative to the influenza (flu) shot. It is safe for all ages and pregnant or nursing women. This injection has no known side effects, is suitable for long-term treatment and may be used for both the prevention and treatment of various viral infections. Arnica is an herb that is used to help treat muscle pain, stiffness, bruising, swelling and bleeding. As an injection, its able to directly aid the area that's bruised or in pain for relief. Cosmetic Rejuvenation injections use natural ingredients to reduce fine lines, wrinkles and puffiness. The injections used alongside cosmetic acupuncture can create youthful looking results and a refreshed feeling for your skin. Vitamin B12 is energy enchancing and play a vital role in keeping you healthy. If you are deficient in B12, you may have trouble concentrating, mood changes, low energy, tingling sensation or numbness in hands or feet or Megaloblastic anemia. Vitamin B12 is important for carbohydrate metabolism, keeping nerve and blood cells healthy and making DNA. Taking Vitamin B12 helps to prevent megaloblastic anemia which causes feelings of weakness and tiredness. Vitamin C boosts the immune systems natural defenses and is necessary for the development, growth and repair of all of our body tissues. It's involved in various body functions and helps to create collagen, strengthen the immune system, heal wounds, protect memory and manage high blood pressure. Zeel is a homeopathic combination remedy that may be able to reduce stiffness,swelling, pain and inflammation. It can help mild to moderate arthritic pain, joint stiffness and osteoarthritis.
